promo.title: Invoice directly from your bank. Quick, easy, and with discounts up to 50 %
promo.detail: New businesses receive a 50 % discount on all Fakturoid plans for an entire year. Are you an established business? Get a 15 % permanent discount. The discount applies to existing users as well. The basic plan is free.

bullets.text: Overview of both paid and unpaid invoices

promo.userActionRequiredSectionTitle: Pair your account to Fakturoid and receive the discount
promo.userActionRequired:
Confirm that the information below can be shared with Fakturoid in order to pair your account. We will handle the rest.
If you don’t have a Fakturoid account, you will be redirected to create one.

agreement.title: I consent to sharing my Identification Number with Fakturoid.
agreement.error: To continue, you need to agree to share your company details with Fakturoid.

victory.title:
Done!
Your account has been paired
victory.detail: From now on you can manage invoices in Smart Banka.

invoicesOverview.title: Invoice Overview
invoicesOverview.infoMessage: Information is updated within 30 minutes after payment is processed.
